objarg.name: envelope-buffer
objarg.digest: (optional) the initial envelope buffer for all grains
objarg.description: (optional) the initial envelope buffer for all grains

method.name: g
method.digest: sends a message to a single grain
method.description: sends a message to a single grain

method.name: int
method.digest: enables and disables the granulator
method.description: enables and disables the granulator

method.name: trav
method.digest: DEPRICATED the amound grains are delayed in ms
method.description: DEPRICATED the amound grains are delayed in ms

method.name: travRandom
method.digest: DEPRICATED the amound grains are delayed in ms
method.description: DEPRICATED the amound grains are delayed in ms

method.name: windowBuffer
method.digest: sets the buffer for window modes 1 and 2
method.description: sets the buffer for window modes 1 and 2

method.name: travOffset
method.digest: DEPRICATED message to set the amound grains are delayed in ms
method.description: DEPRICATED message to set the amound grains are delayed in ms

method.name: envPositionRandom
method.digest: sets the 2D envelope position
method.description: sets the 2D envelope position

method.name: streamTarget
method.digest: messages will target grains assigned to this stream
method.description: messages will target grains assigned to this stream

method.name: target
method.digest: sends a message to a single grain
method.description: sends a message to a single grain

method.name: rateBuffer
method.digest: sets the buffer for rate modes 1 and 2
method.description: sets the buffer for rate modes 1 and 2

method.name: windowOffsetRandom
method.digest: DEPRICATED message for setting the window offset attribute
method.description: DEPRICATED message for setting the window offset attribute

method.name: stream
method.digest: sets an attribute or message for all grains in a stream
method.description: sets an attribute or message for all grains in a stream

method.name: streamDeviate
method.digest: will deviate any parameter based on streams
method.description: will deviate any parameter based on streams

method.name: streamSpread
method.digest: will create evenly spaced values between each number based on streams
method.description: will create evenly spaced values between each number based on streams

method.name: bufChans
method.digest: sets buffer channels to all grains in an interleved fashion
method.description: sets buffer channels to all grains in an interleved fashion

method.name: windowMode
method.digest: sets the window mode
method.description: sets the window mode. 0 = normal, 1 = read from buffer based on grain index, 2 = read from buffer randomly

method.name: bufChan
method.digest: sets the channel of grains with a certain channel
method.description: sets the channel of grains with a certain channel. Should be used with the g message

method.name: chanMode
method.digest: If greater than 1, channels are assigned at random
method.description: If greater than 1, channels are assigned at random

method.name: gchan
method.digest: sets an attribute of message for all grains assigned to a buffer channel
method.description: sets an attribute of message for all grains assigned to a buffer channel

method.name: delayMode
method.digest: sets the delay mode
method.description: sets the delay mode. 0 = normal, 1 = read from buffer based on grain index, 2 = read from buffer randomly

method.name: rateMode
method.digest: sets the delay mode
method.description: sets the delay mode. 0 = normal, 1 = read from buffer based on grain index, 2 = read from buffer randomly

method.name: env
method.digest: sets the envelope buffer with a second argument defining the number of envelopes in the buffer
method.description: sets the envelope buffer with a second argument defining the number of envelopes in the buffer

method.name: buf
method.digest: sets the granulation buffer
method.description: sets the granulation buffer

method.name: env2D
method.digest: sets the envelope buffer with a second argument defining the number of envelopes in the buffer
method.description: sets the envelope buffer with a second argument defining the number of envelopes in the buffer

method.name: nEnvelopes
method.digest: sets the number of envelopes in the 2d envelope buffer
method.description: sets the number of envelopes in the 2d envelope buffer

method.name: envPosition
method.digest: sets the 2D envelope position
method.description: sets the 2D envelope position

method.name: env2DPosition
method.digest: sets the 2D envelope position
method.description: sets the 2D envelope position

method.name: envPositionOffset
method.digest: sets the 2D envelope position
method.description: sets the 2D envelope position

method.name: delayBuffer
method.digest: sets the buffer for delay modes 1 and 2
method.description: sets the buffer for delay modes 1 and 2

attribute.name: ampOffset
attribute.digest: An amount subtracted from each grains amplitude based on each grains index
attribute.description: An amount subtracted from each grains amplitude based on each grains index.

attribute.name: rateQuantizeSemi
attribute.digest: Snaps grain playback rates to a semitone grid
attribute.description: Snaps grain playback rates to a semitone grid. 0 provides no snapping. Fractional amounts are allowed.

attribute.name: state
attribute.digest: Determines if grainflow is on or off
attribute.description: Determines if grainflow is on or off

attribute.name: rate
attribute.digest: Controls the rate of playback of each grain
attribute.description: Controls the rate of playback of each grain. This will modify pitch.

attribute.name: transposeRandom
attribute.digest: Adds a unipolar random amount to each grains transposition when a grain starts
attribute.description: Adds a unipolar random amount to each grains transposition when a grain starts

attribute.name: transpose
attribute.digest: Controls each grains playback rate in terms of the pitch change that will occur
attribute.description: Controls each grains playback rate in terms of the pitch change that will occur

attribute.name: rateRandom
attribute.digest: Adds a unipolar random amount to the playback rate on each grains start
attribute.description: Adds a unipolar random amount to the playback rate on each grains start.

attribute.name: rateOffset
attribute.digest: Adds an amount to the playback rate based on the grains index
attribute.description: Adds an amount to the playback rate based on the grains index.

attribute.name: transposeOffset
attribute.digest: Adds an amount to each grains transposition based on grain index
attribute.description: Adds an amount to each grains transposition based on grain index

attribute.name: glisson
attribute.digest: How much the playback rate will change over the life of the grain
attribute.description: How much the playback rate will change over the life of the grain. Creates a glissando effect

attribute.name: autoOverlap
attribute.digest: Automatically sets windowOffset based on the number of grains when nGrains is changed
attribute.description: Automatically sets windowOffset based on the number of grains when nGrains is changed

attribute.name: amp
attribute.digest: The amplitude of each grain as a value from 0-1
attribute.description: The amplitude of each grain as a value from 0-1

attribute.name: glissonRandom
attribute.digest: A unipolar random amount added to each grains glisson destination
attribute.description: A unipolar random amount added to each grains glisson destination. Determined at the start of each grain.

attribute.name: ngrains
attribute.digest: the number of active grains
attribute.description: the number of active grains

attribute.name: glissonOffset
attribute.digest: An amount added to each grains glisson destination based on the grain index
attribute.description: An amount added to each grains glisson destination based on the grain index

attribute.name: glissonSt
attribute.digest: Controls the glisson attribute in terms of the pitch change that will occur
attribute.description: Controls the glisson attribute in terms of the pitch change that will occur

attribute.name: glissonStOffset
attribute.digest: An amount added to the glissonSt value based on each grain's index
attribute.description: An amount added to the glissonSt value based on each grain's index

attribute.name: glissonStRandom
attribute.digest: A unipolar random amount added to the glissonSt value
attribute.description: A unipolar random amount added to the glissonSt value. Determined at the start of each grain.

attribute.name: spaceOffset
attribute.digest: the amound of emty space at the end of each grains as a ratio of the total grain size
attribute.description: the amound of emty space at the end of each grains as a ratio of the total grain size

attribute.name: direction
attribute.digest: The probabilty a grain will play forwards or backwards
attribute.description: The probabilty a grain will play forwards or backwards. 1: always forwards, 0: 50% chance forwards or backwards, -1: always backwards

attribute.name: ampRandom
attribute.digest: A unipolar random amount subtracted from each grains amplitude
attribute.description: A unipolar random amount subtracted from each grains amplitude. Determined at the start of each grain

attribute.name: delay
attribute.digest: An offset from the traversal phasor in milliseconds
attribute.description: An offset from the traversal phasor in milliseconds

attribute.name: delayRandom
attribute.digest: A unipolar random offset from the traversal phasor in milliseconds
attribute.description: A unipolar random offset from the traversal phasor in milliseconds. Determined at the start of each grain

attribute.name: delayOffset
attribute.digest: An offset from the traversal phasor in milliseconds based on the index of each grain
attribute.description: An offset from the traversal phasor in milliseconds based on the index of each grain

attribute.name: window
attribute.digest: Sets the position of each grains starting point on the grain clock from 0-1
attribute.description: Sets the position of each grains starting point on the grain clock from 0-1

attribute.name: windowRandom
attribute.digest: Adds a unipolar random amount to each grains window
attribute.description: Adds a unipolar random amount to each grains window

attribute.name: windowOffset
attribute.digest: Adds an offset to the base grain window position based on each grains index
attribute.description: Adds an offset to the base grain window position based on each grains index. When autoOverlap is enabled this is set based on the number of grains

attribute.name: space
attribute.digest: the amound of emty space at the end of each grains as a ratio of the total grain size
attribute.description: the amound of emty space at the end of each grains as a ratio of the total grain size

attribute.name: spaceRandom
attribute.digest: the amound of emty space at the end of each grains as a ratio of the total grain size
attribute.description: the amound of emty space at the end of each grains as a ratio of the total grain size

attribute.name: density
attribute.digest: the probability a grain will play
attribute.description: the probability a grain will play

attribute.name: startPoint
attribute.digest: the start of the loop from 0-1
attribute.description: the start of the loop from 0-1

attribute.name: stopPoint
attribute.digest: the end of the loop from 0-1
attribute.description: the end of the loop from 0-1

attribute.name: loopMode
attribute.digest: how the loops is handled by each grain
attribute.description: how the loops is handled by each grain. 0: ignore the loop. 1: wrap 2: fold
